mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.gndyjzmj AS "gndyjzmj", a.yzbgs AS "yzbgs", a.djbgs AS "djbgs", a.ywkbgs AS "ywkbgs", a.hlkbgs AS "hlkbgs", a.cwkbgs AS "cwkbgs", a.daglkbgs AS "daglkbgs", a.xxzx AS "xxzx", a.ygkbgs AS "ygkbgs", a.ybjskbgs AS "ybjskbgs", a.hqglkbgs AS "hqglkbgs", a.dgnhys AS "dgnhys", a.xyf AS "xyf", a.yycf AS "yycf", a.ylljzcjljzcj AS "ylljzcjljzcj", a.shljzcjljzcj AS "shljzcjljzcj", a.tpj AS "tpj", a.bpdsbpdyf AS "bpdsbpdyf", a.bpdzbsbpdyf AS "bpdzbsbpdyf", a.cyfdjfcyfdyf AS "cyfdjfcyfdyf", a.ykcyfdyf AS "ykcyfdyf", a.dtjf AS "dtjf", a.glfglyf AS "glfglyf", a.glkzsglyf AS "glkzsglyf", a.rqbjglyf AS "rqbjglyf", a.lsjf AS "lsjf", a.ktjf AS "ktjf", a.tfjf AS "tfjf", a.gsbf AS "gsbf", a.xfbf AS "xfbf", a.bjzs AS "bjzs", a.xfsxj AS "xfsxj", a.xfkzs AS "xfkzs", a.afjks AS "afjks", a.txwljf AS "txwljf", a.xxhxtjf AS "xxhxtjf", a.mws AS "mws", a.sntcc AS "sntcc", a.qtqzm AS "qtqzm"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_five_znglyf( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, gndyjzmj, yzbgs, djbgs, ywkbgs, hlkbgs, cwkbgs, daglkbgs, xxzx, ygkbgs, ybjskbgs, hqglkbgs, dgnhys, xyf, yycf, ylljzcjljzcj, shljzcjljzcj, tpj, bpdsbpdyf, bpdzbsbpdyf, cyfdjfcyfdyf, ykcyfdyf, dtjf, glfglyf, glkzsglyf, rqbjglyf, lsjf, ktjf, tfjf, gsbf, xfbf, bjzs, xfsxj, xfkzs, afjks, txwljf, xxhxtjf, mws, sntcc, qtqzm ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{gndyjzmj}, #{yzbgs}, #{djbgs}, #{ywkbgs}, #{hlkbgs}, #{cwkbgs}, #{daglkbgs}, #{xxzx}, #{ygkbgs}, #{ybjskbgs}, #{hqglkbgs}, #{dgnhys}, #{xyf}, #{yycf}, #{ylljzcjljzcj}, #{shljzcjljzcj}, #{tpj}, #{bpdsbpdyf}, #{bpdzbsbpdyf}, #{cyfdjfcyfdyf}, #{ykcyfdyf}, #{dtjf}, #{glfglyf}, #{glkzsglyf}, #{rqbjglyf}, #{lsjf}, #{ktjf}, #{tfjf}, #{gsbf}, #{xfbf}, #{bjzs}, #{xfsxj}, #{xfkzs}, #{afjks}, #{txwljf}, #{xxhxtjf}, #{mws}, #{sntcc}, #{qtqzm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_five_znglyf SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, gndyjzmj = #{gndyjzmj}, yzbgs = #{yzbgs}, djbgs = #{djbgs}, ywkbgs = #{ywkbgs}, hlkbgs = #{hlkbgs}, cwkbgs = #{cwkbgs}, daglkbgs = #{daglkbgs}, xxzx = #{xxzx}, ygkbgs = #{ygkbgs}, ybjskbgs = #{ybjskbgs}, hqglkbgs = #{hqglkbgs}, dgnhys = #{dgnhys}, xyf = #{xyf}, yycf = #{yycf}, ylljzcjljzcj = #{ylljzcjljzcj}, shljzcjljzcj = #{shljzcjljzcj}, tpj = #{tpj}, bpdsbpdyf = #{bpdsbpdyf}, bpdzbsbpdyf = #{bpdzbsbpdyf}, cyfdjfcyfdyf = #{cyfdjfcyfdyf}, ykcyfdyf = #{ykcyfdyf}, dtjf = #{dtjf}, glfglyf = #{glfglyf}, glkzsglyf = #{glkzsglyf}, rqbjglyf = #{rqbjglyf}, lsjf = #{lsjf}, ktjf = #{ktjf}, tfjf = #{tfjf}, gsbf = #{gsbf}, xfbf = #{xfbf}, bjzs = #{bjzs}, xfsxj = #{xfsxj}, xfkzs = #{xfkzs}, afjks = #{afjks}, txwljf = #{txwljf}, xxhxtjf = #{xxhxtjf}, mws = #{mws}, sntcc = #{sntcc}, qtqzm = #{qtqzm} WHERE id = #{id}
